response.answer_text: Sushrutha was Auyrvedic Doctor lived about thousand years back .Sushrutha originated surgery in Ayurveda .He had made enormous contribution to growth of Ayurveda .In his work surgery of head and equipments for surgery are included .How he performed such complicated surgery without anasthesia is a wonder .Charka (general medicine )and Sushrutha (surgery )are founding fathers of Ayurvedic Medical Science
